Package lbfgsb

A wrapper for the C wrapper for the original fortran version of the L-BFGS-B algorithm.

Exception Summary
LBFGSBException  
 

Package lbfgsb Description

A wrapper for the C wrapper for the original fortran version of the L-BFGS-B algorithm. The main class is called Minimizer.
